comment: I enjoyed the content. This course enhanced my knowledge of databases, data warehouses, etc. I really enjoyed learning about SQL and how to construct enhanced ER diagrams.
Professor Tian was always available to answer any and every question that I had regarding an assignment. She explained things a bit clearer, too.
One of the best professors at KSU. Extremely knowledgeable always willing to help response to email quickly and provides clarity on anything that is brought to her attention

I enjoyed the course notes and power points. Very helpful information and the assignments were great in tying all the content together. I really enjoyed this class. The instructor was responsive and has great insight.
Professor Shirly Tian has a good understanding of the course and disseminates information in a very concise and effective manner. The professor is also helpful to my need as a veteran.
I attended her office hours one time, and she was very helpful in helping me understand the issue I was confused about. She responded to emails in a timely manner, and was very nice in her responses.

i believe that professor Tian does in fact know the information however like every other professor here, they just read off the powerpoints and get assignments from the internet. So if you want to actually learn things talk to her after class and she will go into more detail otherwise this class is easy due to the internet. Shes also very kind
Dr Tian gives clear and precise feedback that allows you to make the necessary corrections. Understands the circumstances of online study and tailors materials for effective learning.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I like the announcement send by Dr. Tian every week to remind me about the course content and upcoming due dates. That really helps me to arrange my time. And Dr. Tian replied the email very fast. I really appreciated that she always replied to me on the weekend or holidays.

Prof. Tian is one of the great professors I have at KSU. She was very willing to help students and work with us as well. She was very open to questions as well. I learned a lot about network and subnetting. She is caring for her students and would like to see them succeed.

Your run of the mill professor that just reads off of PowerPoints. She seems to be very knowledgeable of the material, but her nervousness and accent can make it hard to understand. Class has 3 exams, quizzes and labs about every other week, a group project (either write a big paper, or use wireshark), and attendance is graded.
Good Teacher. Fare grading policy. She is available to for your questions and She cares. I would take her course again.

She is a great professor focused for your learning. She is available and ready to help. Course grading is combination of papers, quiz, test and discussions. Which creates great atmosphere for learning. I took her course at my last semester and I wish I have taken her course earlier. I suggest Prof. Tian, if you are looking for fun and fare course.
